name: Axis of the Secret Source
desc:
Comes from a now-defunct Secret Source Automaton.
It appears to be just a component that was used to connect two mechanisms.

value.text:
Stardust Exchange
Dropped by Secret Source Automaton: Hunter-Seeker

customize.name: Secret Source Automaton: Hunter-Seeker
customize.desc:
An ancient ruin automaton used in object collection.
Legend has it that these ancient ruin machines were designed for specialized work functions, primarily conducting experimental work such as capturing and collecting samples, and had only basic combat functionality.
According to rumor, these were not built by humans, but are instead creations of a yet more ancient civilization. Today, that civilization has been lost, and all that remains are these strange machines that roam the land.

customize.name: Axis of the Secret Source
customize.desc:
Comes from a now-defunct Secret Source Automaton.
It appears to be just a component that was used to connect two mechanisms.

customize.name: Masterless Stardust
customize.desc:
Currency used to purchase rare resources from the Shop.
Surplus Stardust of destiny. Perhaps it can create new destinies when in large enough quantities.

customize.name: Ash-Graven Drinking Horn
customize.desc: A ritual vessel passed down amongst the Meztli. They say that this was once a treasure much-valued, yet never used, by the hero "Giant" Tupac.

customize.name: Footprint of the Rainbow
customize.desc: A keen polearm forged from jade. It gives off rainbow-hued light when exposed to sunlight.

customize.name: A Thousand Blazing Suns
customize.desc: A greatsword that dazzles like the rising sun. It has witnessed the extinguishing and rekindling of innumerable suns.

customize.name: Fruitful Hook
customize.desc: Bold Burkina from the Scions of the Canopy once made this weapon with the hero Tenoch's help â€” all for the sake of obtaining Flamegranates unmatched throughout Natlan.

customize.name: Peak Patrol Song
customize.desc: An obsidian blade of unparalleled sharpness, light as a song. It was modified by a certain artisan to come equipped with a record-playing detachable Phlogiston Device.

customize.name: Sheath of the Secret Source
customize.desc:
Comes from a now-defunct Secret Source Automaton.
It appears to be the mechanism by which the Secret Source Automaton was powered, but its core is now empty.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Axis of the Secret Source
customize.desc:
Comes from a now-defunct Secret Source Automaton.
It appears to be just a component that was used to connect two mechanisms.

customize.name: Sheath of the Secret Source
customize.desc:
Comes from a now-defunct Secret Source Automaton.
It appears to be the mechanism by which the Secret Source Automaton was powered, but its core is now empty.

customize.name: Heart of the Secret Source
customize.desc:
Comes from a now-defunct Secret Source Automaton.
It appears to be an intact core by which the Secret Source Automaton was powered, a strange device that seems to have been produced as a universal component. According to legend, the ingenious thinkers of antiquity drew upon the same wisdom used in the creation of golden patterns to design the blueprints by which these extraordinary machines functioned. Perhaps this core was one of them.
